title: Height of building shall be permissible as per regulation No
clause_text: Height of building shall be permissible as per regulation No.6.10 subject to FSI permissibility under this regulation.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
